description: As the Legal Administrative Assistant at this growing law firm in the Los Angeles office, you will be providing legal administrative support to several Partners in a busy corporate practice group. As an extension of the Partners, you will play a critical role in providing top-notch administrative support in a deadline-driven and dynamic environment. In addition to assisting with exciting legal work and helping to finalize critical legal documents, you will also be called on to coordinate meetings and events as well as arrange international and domestic travel. Candidates should have 5+ years of Legal Secretary experience in a law firm environment. Strong technical and communication skills required. For consideration, email your resume today!
responsibilities: Providing legal administrative support to several Partners, assisting with legal work, finalizing legal documents, coordinating meetings and events, arranging travel.

qualifications.required: 5+ years of Legal Secretary experience in a law firm environment. Strong technical and communication skills required.

benefits: Hybrid Schedule: 1-2 days remote per week
